whoIAm: I'm Charlie Swinhoe, a founder and builder who loves shipping products. I've spent the last few years turning ideas into profitable businesses, from SaaS platforms to passion projects. My approach is simple: build fast, learn faster, and never stop shipping.

journey.title: Scaling Multiple Products
journey.description: Currently running 3 profitable SaaS products with $100k+ ARR combined. Focused on building in public and helping other founders.

journey.title: First $50k MRR Product
journey.description: Launched a SaaS dashboard platform that hit $50k MRR in 6 months. Learned everything about product-market fit, growth, and retention.

journey.title: Full-Time Founder
journey.description: Left my job to build products full-time. Best decision I ever made. Started with freelancing to fund my first product.

journey.title: First Product Launch
journey.description: Built and launched my first side project. It failed, but I learned more in 3 months than I did in 3 years of college.

beliefs: Build in public, learn from others
Solve real problems for real people
Never stop learning, never stop building

beyondWork.description: When I'm not building, you'll find me reading about business strategy, working out, or exploring new technologies. I believe in the power of continuous learning and staying curious.
